subject: Basketball
Celebrities
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: With Carmelo Anthony watching as an assistant coach, the East team fell to the West in the N.B.A. All-Star Celebrity Game at Madison Square Garden despite an M.V.P. performance from Kevin Hart.
snippet: With Carmelo Anthony watching as an assistant coach, the East team fell to the West in the N.B.A. All-Star Celebrity Game at Madison Square Garden despite an M.V.P. performance from Kevin Hart.
